meanings: Noun 신은 우리와 함께 계시나니(God is with us.), 신의 가호가 있으시길(God be with us.).

phrases.phrase: ein feste Burg ist unser Gott

examples.korean: He is the son of Peter Gott, the legendary artisan pork and wild boar producer, and is cut from the same cloth. 발음듣기 그는 전설적인 돼지와 멧돼지 생산 장인인 피터 고트의 아들로 부전자전이다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. einky(eink****) Web Collection
examples.english: He is the son of Peter Gott, the legendary artisan pork and wild boar producer, and is cut from the same cloth. 발음
In death he had a beatific aura: his bullet-punctured body was compared to Mantegna's Dead Christ, Gott recalls. 발음
Also catch the recut of 'I Gott Grapes'. 발음
Mein Gott! We had always told them it was not proven…. 발음
